params.prompt: A full-body, realistic {{step1.output.gender}} character inspired by the style of {{workflow.parameters.game_name}}, with detailed, genre-appropriate attire and elements that match the iconic look and atmosphere of the {{workflow.parameters.game_name}} universe, without any NSFW content. The character stands in a dynamic pose, looking directly at the camera with a confident expression, and their unmasked face is clearly visible. The background reflects the {{workflow.parameters.game_name}} setting, adding elements like shadows, energy effects, or mystical scenery that enhance the game’s unique atmosphere. The style is detailed and cinematic, emphasizing the character’s full body and facial features to authentically represent the essence of {{workflow.parameters.game_name}}.
a person in a post apocalyptic  {{workflow.parameters.game_name}} game. no nsfw

A lifelike, animated video of a character from {{workflow.parameters.game_name}}. The character photograph is brought to life with subtle, game-inspired movements, such as expressive glances, slight shifts in stance, and natural facial expressions. The background and lighting reflect the immersive world of {{workflow.parameters.game_name}}, creating a seamless blend of realism and the game’s unique atmosphere.
